name: Block Out (Maddykun)
description:
Block Out is a top-down shooter with flashy graphics and calm music.

Controls

    Use (keyboard to move around) and (mouse to aim and shoot)

        W, S, A, D to move

        Spacebar to teleport/dodge

        Left mouse button to shoot

        Right mouse button for melee attack

        R to respawn

The game allows you to customize gameplay elements to make your own exciting "game modes". 

You can make all kinds of game modes, from frustratingly challenging  to utterly relaxing. The following things (and much more :) can be edited in the mode creation screen:

Player

- Number of lives (can be infinite :)

- Number of bullets (also can be infinite)

- Enable/Disable special abilities:

    - Teleport/Dodge

    - Melee attack

Enemy

- Number of Enemies ( can be infinite )

- Type of Enemies ( up to 5 types to choose from)

- For each type of enemy:

    - Movement speed

    - Movement direction (towards or away from the player)

    - can/cannot shoot

    - rate of fire

    - Spawning Properties
